Consider the set of numbers $\{1,10,10^2,10^3, ... 10^{10} \}$. The ratio of the largest element of the set to the sum of the other ten elements of the set is closest to which integer?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  1 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\  9 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\  10 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\  11 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 101  $
